summary: New textures for plants and apha channel
descriptionHtml:
Hi all;)

Most modifications such as always depended on the intensity of the color change and nothing else.
Thanks to this alpha channel transparency of a reduced effect of this was that the - component plants after the break they looked the same as before the break!
Thanks so not once flew to the plant itself as seen from a distance of (cos there is) and place it turned out that nothing of this: D
The original texture nieruszane by lovers (saturation and nothing more) they looked too pale - but it is properly respond to breaking component ...
-------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------
In my modification poloczylem find everything here and new colors and set them according to the alpha channel!
-------------------------------------------------- -----------------------------------------------

The modification changes the appearance of all plants.

- Changed colors.
- Changed the saturation of colors.
- Now the break is only a small plant flowers! (after a period away you already know you have something to break or not yet)
- I set the alpha channel so that when the plants break you can see it was still only in the lower parts of the plant ...
- Changed texture sharpness.
- Many plants I added extra texture. (as in my modified grass)
- Now are more realistic colors (red = red no orange, etc. ..)

IMPORTANT - before copying files make sure the folder (skyrim / data / textures / plants) is empty, or in general do not have one :)
otherwise it is a small chance, but it is that you have the files under extensions (n) example [plants_n.dds] who will not be replaced by my tosline and contains data from other plants - it will not correct display of textures! (bad bumpmapping)

MY OTHER MODS

author: vito740
